text: Mbe Antiokan Zisas khothɨgap ana zɨn vui gumgi gu mbigi, mbe mbe sarigim, mbe nda vov, Fonisia gum Samaria kɨtɨgen daav, mani kɨtɨgar maam Zisas khothɨgap ana zɨn vui gumgi gu, mbigi, mbe kha kamen bun mbe nzuav ndai. Mbe khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Fhe Bakɨme mba harigi ŋgui gumgi gu mbigi, ndavi dorgim, mbe ana zɨn vui.” Mbe ne bun nzuaim, mba maaŋ kav Zisas khothɨgap ana zɨn vui gumgi gu mbigi mbe ne mbararagiap, mben ndavi guigira mben vhergi.
